channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【A story of collaborating agents: chatting with your database the right way】一个合作代理人的故事：以正确的方式与您的数据库聊天
item.description: 【Today, more and more customers are embracing AI with one clear goal in mind: they want to chat with their data. And by “data,” they mean all of it: structured tables, unstructured documents, images, audio, and more. This demand has given rise to hybrid approaches that blend semantic understanding with precise data retrieval. But here’s […]】如今，越来越多的客户正在考虑一个明确的目标：他们想与数据聊天。通过“数据”，它们的意思是所有：结构化表，非结构化文档，图像，音频等。这种需求引起了混合方法，将语义理解与精确的数据检索融为一体。但这是[…]

item.title: 【Extension Manager updates in Visual Studio】Visual Studio中的扩展管理器更新
item.description: 【The latest updates in Visual Studio 2022 introduced features specifically designed to improve how you manage extensions. These updates offer tools that help you automate processes, provide detailed controls for configuration, and enhance the user interface to streamline your development workflows. Seamless auto updates Visual Studio now automatically triggers updates whenever you open the Extension […]】Visual Studio 2022中的最新更新引入了专门设计的功能，以改善您管理扩展的方式。这些更新提供的工具可帮助您自动化流程，为配置提供详细的控件，并增强用户界面以简化开发工作流程。无缝自动更新Visual Studio现在每当打开扩展名时会自动触发更新[…]

item.title: 【D3D12 Shader Execution Reordering】D3D12着色器执行重新排序
item.description: 【Shader Execution Reordering (SER) is an addition to DirectX Raytracing that enables application shader code inform hardware how to find coherency across rays so they can be sorted to execute better in parallel. At GDC 2025 DXR 1.2 was announced including SER, and you can see it discussed in this: GDC DirectX State Of The […]】着色器执行重新排序（SER）是DirectX RayTracing的补充，可启用应用程序着色器代码信息硬件如何在射线之间找到相干性，以便对它们进行分类以在并行中更好地执行。在GDC 2025 DXR 1.2上宣布了包括SER，您可以在此处看到：GDC Directx […]的GDC Directx状态

item.title: 【Agility SDK 1.717-preview and 1.616-retail】敏捷性SDK 1.717-preiview和1.616-Ortail
item.description: 【We are pleased to announce both a retail and preview Agility SDK release with several new features, available on Agility SDK Downloads today! As usual, the features in this release come with Day One PIX support. Please read the PIX blog post for more information. Agility SDK 1.717-preview features Cooperative Vectors unlocks powerful new hardware acceleration for […]】我们很高兴地宣布零售和预览敏捷性SDK版本，并具有几个新功能，可在Agility SDK下载可用！像往常一样，此版本中的功能由第一天的PIX支持带来。请阅读PIX博客文章以获取更多信息。敏捷性SDK 1.717-preiview功能合作矢量解锁[…]的强大新硬件加速度

item.title: 【Stating the obvious about debugging an invalid parameter error when freeing memory】说明在释放内存时调试无效参数错误的明显
item.description: 【Writing it down for posterity.】将其写下来以进行后代。

item.title: 【Powering Real-Time Messaging at Scale with Azure Cosmos DB】使用Azure Cosmos DB大规模供电实时消息传递
item.description: 【Microsoft Teams, Copilot, Azure Communication Services and many other product offerings from Microsoft, rely on a unified messaging platform that powers real-time communication and collaboration at an unprecedented scale. This messaging platform has become critical for enabling boundary-less collaboration, supporting hundreds of millions of users worldwide. To ensure global discovery, durable storage and performance needed […]】Microsoft团队，Copilot，Azure Communication Services和Microsoft的许多其他产品都依靠一个统一的消息平台，该平台以前所未有的规模为实时通信和协作提供动力。这个消息平台对于实现无边界协作，支持全球数亿用户至关重要。为了确保全球发现，需要耐用的存储和性能[…]

item.title: 【PIX 2505.30 and 2505.30-preview: support for DXR 1.2, Cooperative Vectors and more】PIX 2505.30和2505.30-preview：对DXR 1.2的支持，合作向量等
item.description: 【Today we released two new versions of PIX, which can be downloaded here. These complement the new D3D12 Agility SDKs released today. The new versions of PIX are: PIX 2505.30 – supports the new retail D3D12 features released today in Agility SDK 1.616, including: Opacity Micromaps (OMMs) Tiled Resources Tier 4 PIX 2505.30-preview – supports the […]】今天，我们发布了两个新版本的Pix，可以在此处下载。这些补充了今天发布的新的D3D12敏捷性SDK。 pix的新版本是：PIX 2505.30 - 支持今天在Agility SDK 1.616中发布的新零售D3D12功能，包括：不透明度micromaps（OMMS）瓷砖资源层4 PIX 2505.30-PREVIEW - 支持[…] […]

item.title: 【D3D12 Opacity Micromaps】D3D12不透明度微型
item.description: 【DirectX Raytracing (DXR) now supports Opacity Micromaps (OMMs), enabling hardware to handle alpha tested geometry more efficiently than relying only on costly AnyHit shader invocations. At GDC 2025 DXR 1.2 was announced including OMMs, and you can see it discussed in this: GDC DirectX State Of The Union YouTube Recording. In the video, Remedy showed […]】DirectX RayTracing（DXR）现在支持不透明度微型胶带（OMMS），使硬件能够更有效地处理经α测试的几何形状，而不是仅依赖昂贵的Anyhit Anyhit Shinder Inccocations。在GDC 2025 DXR 1.2上宣布了包括OMMS，您可以在此处看到：GDC Directx YouTube录制。在视频中，补救措施显示[…]

item.title: 【GitHub Secret Protection and GitHub Code Security for Azure DevOps】GitHub秘密保护和Azure DevOps的GitHub代码安全性
item.description: 【Following the changes to GitHub Advanced Security on GitHub, we’re launching the standalone security products of GitHub Secret Protection and GitHub Code Security for Azure DevOps today. You can bring the protection of Advanced Security to your enterprise with the flexibility to enable the right level of protection for your repositories. GitHub Secret Protection for […]】在GITHUB上对GitHub Advanced Security进行了更改后，我们正在为Azure DevOps推出GitHub Secret Protection和GitHub Code Security的独立安全产品。您可以将高级安全保护的保护带入您的企业，以便灵活地为您的存储库提供适当的保护级别。 Github的秘密保护[…]

item.title: 【D3D12 Cooperative Vector】D3D12合作矢量
item.description: 【Welcome to the preview release for Cooperative Vector support in D3D12. This exposes powerful new hardware acceleration for vector and matrix operations, enabling developers to efficiently drive neural rendering techniques directly from individual shader threads in real-time graphics pipelines. In research and in industry, machine learning based approaches have made their way to mainstream, replacing/augmenting […]】欢迎来到D3D12中合作向量支持的预览发布。 这将为向量和矩阵操作公开强大的新硬件加速度，使开发人员能够在实时图形管道中直接从单个着色器线程中直接从单个着色器线程中驱动神经渲染技术。在研究和行业中，基于机器学习的方法已成为主流，取代/增强[…]
